origin: DNS helpers for wide-area discovery (Tailscale + CoreDNS)
translate: 用于广域发现的 DNS 助手 (Tailscale + CoreDNS)

origin: Setup CoreDNS to serve the discovery domain for unicast DNS-SD (Wide-Area Bonjour)
translate: 设置 CoreDNS 以服务于单播 DNS-SD (广域 Bonjour) 的发现域

origin: Install/update CoreDNS config and (re)start the service (requires sudo)
translate: 安装/更新 CoreDNS 配置并(重新)启动服务 (需要 sudo)

origin: No wide-area domain configured. Set discovery.wideArea.domain or pass --domain.
translate: 未配置广域发现域。请设置 discovery.wideArea.domain 或传递 --domain。

origin: Run with --apply to install CoreDNS and configure it.
translate: 运行 --apply 以安装 CoreDNS 并配置它。

origin: dns setup is currently supported on macOS only
translate: dns setup 目前仅支持 macOS

origin: no tailnet IP detected; ensure Tailscale is running on this machine
translate: 未检测到 Tailnet IP；请确保 Tailscale 正在本机运行
